ComicInfo.Summary: Brother's Keeper: Marc Simmons, a profiler, is sent to help capture The Crocodile-Killer. Sam and Twitch are hired to prove that Roger Bonner is not The Crocodile Killer.
ComicInfo.Title: Brother's Keeper
